title: InvoiceFlow
description: Production SaaS invoicing platform with secure authentication, multi-tenant architecture, and analytics-driven iterations. Built end-to-end and deployed for real users.

title: SleepEase
description: Production-ready wellness app for better sleep with emotion-based audio recommendations, streak tracking, and Razorpay subscriptions. Includes curated audio categories, WhatsApp reminders, and an admin dashboard for content management.

title: ElderCare Companion
description: Full-stack healthcare reminder system with automated WhatsApp reminders, real-time dashboard, multi-language support, OTP onboarding, and daily reports.

title: Aura Voice Engine
description: Real-time AI voice conversation system with sub-second latency, streaming responses, Hinglish support, and emotional intelligence.

title: Prompt to Power
description: Prompt-driven product experience that helps users turn ideas into structured outputs with a fast, clean interface and responsive UX.

title: Riya AI
description: AI-powered platform delivering intelligent experiences with a modern, responsive UI and production-ready architecture.

title: SpeakUp
description: AI-assisted spoken English learning platform with pronunciation feedback and interactive practice flows.
